job_details.Vacaturetitel: Full Stack Developer - AI Fact Checker
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?

   We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.

   About the opportunity:
     * Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
     * This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you

   You may contribute your expertise by…
     * Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
     * Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models, * Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer - AI Fact Checker

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?

   We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.

   About the opportunity:
     * Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
     * This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you

   You may contribute your expertise by…
     * Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
     * Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models, * Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on using AI tools to enhance productivity and assist in tasks like evaluating AI-generated code, rather than developing or engineering AI models. It lacks the core responsibilities and technical depth expected of an ML or GenAI Engineer.

phrases: help train generative artificial intelligence models
engaging with these models as they learn to code
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate interaction with and training of AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, albeit from a user/evaluator perspective rather than a developer.
The description explicitly seeks individuals with software engineering and coding expertise, aligning with the 'Software Development' task category.

phrases: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: This phrase suggests that the role is open to individuals who can learn and adapt to new AI concepts and tools, fitting the 'Learning & Adaptability' skill.

phrases: Crafting and answering questions related to computer science
Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
soft_skills.justification: These tasks require analytical thinking and judgment to assess and provide feedback on AI outputs, aligning with 'Problem Solving & Pragmatism'.
